description: Describes the authorization rules for a specified Client VPN endpoint.

parameters.name: ClientVpnEndpointId
parameters.description: The ID of the Client VPN endpoint.

parameters.name: Filters
parameters.description: One or more filters. Filter names and values are case-sensitive. description - The description of the authorization rule. destination-cidr - The CIDR of the network to which the authorization rule applies. group-id - The ID of the Active Directory group to which the authorization rule grants access. (dict) --- A filter name and value pair that is used to return a more specific list of results from a describe operation. Filters can be used to match a set of resources by specific criteria, such as tags, attributes, or IDs. If you specify multiple filters, the filters are joined with an AND, and the request returns only results that match all of the specified filters. For more information, see List and filter using the CLI and API in the Amazon EC2 User Guide. Name (string) --- The name of the filter. Filter names are case-sensitive. Values (list) --- The filter values. Filter values are case-sensitive. If you specify multiple values for a filter, the values are joined with an OR, and the request returns all results that match any of the specified values. (string) ---

nested_items.name: ClientVpnEndpointId
nested_items.description: The ID of the Client VPN endpoint with which the authorization rule is associated.

nested_items.name: Description
nested_items.description: A brief description of the authorization rule.

nested_items.name: GroupId
nested_items.description: The ID of the Active Directory group to which the authorization rule grants access.

nested_items.name: AccessAll
nested_items.description: Indicates whether the authorization rule grants access to all clients.

nested_items.name: DestinationCidr
nested_items.description: The IPv4 address range, in CIDR notation, of the network to which the authorization rule applies.

nested_items.name: Code
nested_items.description: The state of the authorization rule.

nested_items.name: Message
nested_items.description: A message about the status of the authorization rule, if applicable.

nested_items.name: NextToken
nested_items.description: The token to use to retrieve the next page of results. This value is null when there are no more results to return.
